bill_profile.bill_title: Members of Congress Use of Nonpublic Information
bill_profile.bill_summary: Prohibits Members of Congress and employees of Congress from using nonpublic information derived from their official positions for personal benefit.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE Committee on HOMELAND SEC. & GOV. AFFAIRS: Reported by Senator Lieberman without amend. & without written report.
